attributes.action: Stop Shamima Begum return to the UK .
attributes.additional_details: By letting this girl enter the country the government will give a very weak signal to the other radicals . A strong message is needed at all times
attributes.background: We urge the government to stop entry of the East London school girl Shamima Begum to the UK . Although She is a British citizen and therefore she has rights to return to her country , she has sided with ISIS, a notorious terrorist organisation . This can be taken as a treason against the country .
